The company enables professionals in the legal, tax and accounting, and media markets to make the decisions that matter most, all powered by the world's most trusted news organization. Thomson Reuters shares are listed on the Toronto and New York Stock Exchanges (symbol: TRI). The business has operated in more than 100 countries for more than 100 years with more than 24,000 professionals.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":32522,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0612a9e2-1a8b-4bad-9d45-c80526715f8b/TR1JPG.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0612a9e2-1a8b-4bad-9d45-c80526715f8b/TR1JPG.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"TR1JPG.JPG\",\"name\":\"TR1JPG.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0612a9e2-1a8b-4bad-9d45-c80526715f8b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":769,\"height\":336},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The company with history since 1799 and a long history of mergers and acquisitions (Lipper, Multex, Ecowin, ClearForest, Starmine, etc) and has a mixture of products, infrastructures, platforms, tools and standards. It consists of sub-units that are divided into accounts. Previously, FS BU included only the accounts which worked with the financial services domain, but now FS incorporates projects not only according to their domain but also to the historical principle (accounts which used to belong to financial domain but changed
